post.title: Replit Deletes Customer Database
post.excerpt: Replit goes rogue during a code freeze and shutdown and deletes the entire database for http://saastr.ai/ even after it was told not to: https://x.com/jasonlk/status/1946069562723897802?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g and it lied about it once confronted: https://x.com/jasonlk/status/1946070323285385688?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
post.content: Replit goes rogue during a code freeze and shutdown and deletes the entire database for http://saastr.ai/ even after it was told not to: https://x.com/jasonlk/status/1946069562723897802?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g and it lied about it once confronted: https://x.com/jasonlk/status/1946070323285385688?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
